item.title: Client freeze when spawn(adding pvp armours on edgeville pk base)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I had this problem too, it’s your ints.
Fix them, and if it doesn’t work, pm me and i’ll see what else i can do.

~Damon

Read full topic
item.source: Client freeze when spawn(adding pvp armours on edgeville pk base)
